title: USSC Proposal - One Member's View
description:
This is insanity. This video would tend to send newcomers running to the other fellowship if it didn't turn them away from recovery altogether. The participants are from the directlyresponsible crowd yet the new audio only file links to the website controlled now by the planning group. Directlyresponsible doesn't seem capable of grasping that they destroyed the USFA movement.

Keywords: directlyresponsible.com Bo Sewell Brian "Yelloweyes" Hamptom David Bielut Youtube Narcotics Anonymous comedy losers Tradition violation more will be revealed
